sentences.english: The city is noted for its handicrafts. Population, 745,000.

sentences.english: Micro - electroforming is characterized by both resist - patterned electroplating and resist - structural electrodepositing.

sentences.english: The process of phytosterol extraction from soybean oil deodorizer distillate was studied.

sentences.english: Concreting technology for the box girders and construction method for the prestressing system are dealt with as well.

sentences.english: This article describes briefly the preparation technology and the main performance of waterborne high temperature anticorrosion coatings.
